Description: Human readable address or description of location.
The department in charge of the service request.
The date and time when the service request can be expected to be fulfilled. This may be based on a service-specific service level agreement.
The latitude and longitude for the location of the service request.
A URL to media associated with the request, eg an image.
The date and time when the service request was made.
The unique identifier for the service or information request type.
The human readable name of the service request type.
Information about the action expected to fulfill the request or otherwise address the information reported.
The unique ID of the service request created.
The current status of the service request.
Explanation of why the status was changed to current state or more details on current status than conveyed with status alone.
The date and time when the service request was last modified.
The zipcode of where the service occurred.
